method.name: save_image
method.description: Saves an [code]image[/code] as a JPEG file with the given [code]path[/code] using the configured encode options. See [method set_encode_options].

method.name: save_image_to_buffer
method.description: Saves an [code]image[/code] as a JPEG buffer using the configured encode options. See [method set_encode_options].

method.name: set_encode_options
method.description: Sets the encoding options for this [ResourceSaverJPG]. Default options are: [codeblock] { "quality": 85, # Quality: 1-100, higher is better. Typical values are around 50-95. "subsampling": ResourceSaverJPG.SUBSAPLING_H2V2, "two_pass_flag": false, "use_std_tables": false, # Use traditional quantization tables from JPEG Annex K instead of mozjpeg's default. } [/codeblock]

constants.constant: YCbCr, no subsampling (H1V1, YCbCr 1x1x1, 3 blocks per MCU).
YCbCr, H2V1 subsampling (YCbCr 2x1x1, 4 blocks per MCU).
YCbCr, H2V2 subsampling (YCbCr 4x1x1, 6 blocks per MCU. Very common.
Represents the size of the [enum SubSamplingFactor] enum.
